Name: Mahukona
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and strain into glass half-filled with crushed ice. Serve with straws.
Review: Citrus fresh and refreshing, not at all a sweetie.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (Revised Edition) .
Nutrition: One serving of Mahukona contains 140 calories
